segments.text: Sue ? Do you want to join the softball team ? We need another player .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I haven ’ t played softball since I was in high school !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Come on ! It ’ ll be fun . We play every other Saturday afternoon from May until August .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Okay . I guess I could give it a try .
segments.speaker: S2
